definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

pinyin: da3 ji1 jun1 shi4 li4 liang5

sentences.english: Keeping our military and using them when we have to, but not as our first instrument.
sentences.chinese: 保存軍事力量，不到非不得已絕不輕易動武。

sentences.english: Development and equipment of navy armament is significant way to maintain the ocean rights and interests.
sentences.chinese: 海洋權益的維護主要依靠海上軍事力量的建設。

sentences.english: Japan's military power has been derogating the Peaceful Constitution on and on.
sentences.chinese: 日本軍事力量逐漸背離和平憲法。

sentences.english: North Korea’s military abilities remain uncertain and its aggressive intentions remain unpredictable.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮的軍事力量仍未確定，侵略意圖也不可預測。

sentences.english: The bombing of Baghdad demonstrated the awesome power and might of the US military.
sentences.chinese: 對巴格達的轟炸向全世界宣示了美國強大的軍事力量。

sentences.english: And we cannot count on military might alone.
sentences.chinese: 然而我們不能只依靠軍事力量。

sentences.english: Limited war need not always employ a counterforce strategy.
sentences.chinese: 有限戰爭並不一定非採用進攻軍事力量的戰略不可。

sentences.english: Who said of containment against Saddam Hussein We are able to keep arms from him. His military forces have not been rebuilt ?
sentences.chinese: 誰說對薩達姆的圍堵政策使得他不能夠重建軍事力量？

sentences.english: The threat from North Korean military forces, moreover, “cannot be taken lightly”.
sentences.chinese: 此外，朝鮮軍事力量的威脅不可小覷。

sentences.english: Much of the country's military strength lies in its missile force.
sentences.chinese: 該國的軍事力量多集中在導彈部隊上。

sentences.english: China's search for natural resources comes in the context of its growing military.
sentences.chinese: 中國尋找自然資源的需求源自於其增強的軍事力量。

sentences.english: The only Confederate power that remained was the army of General Robert E.
sentences.chinese: 南方軍唯一的軍事力量只剩下羅伯特。

sentences.english: This is why he has put military strength above even feeding his people.
sentences.chinese: 這也是他重視軍事力量更甚於解決人民生計的原因。

sentences.english: Of course, misusing military resources can also undercut soft power.
sentences.chinese: 當然，對軍事力量的濫用也會削弱軟實力。

sentences.english: The rebels are a ragtag force.
sentences.chinese: 利比亞反叛軍是一羣烏合之衆組成的軍事力量。

sentences.english: Or fears of a resurgent Chinese military?
sentences.chinese: 或者出於對中國軍事力量復甦的恐慌？

definition: using the few to defeat the many (idiom); to win from a position of weakness
interregional/spanning two or more PRC provinces
slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
